summary: CONSUMER STATES SHE CAME OUT OF THE STORE AND NOTICED THAT HER TIRE ON THE PASSENGER SIDE HAD A BULGE IN IT, THE SIZE OF A BASEBALL.  SHE ALSO STATES SHE NOW IS A LITTLE UNCOMFORTABLE NOW DRIVING  HER CAR BECAUSE SOMETHING MAY HAPPEN.  SHE HAS CONTINENTAL TIRE ON HER CAR, BUT DOES NOT KNOW THE SIZE.  SHE ALSO STATES SHE RARELY DRIVES HER AUTO, SO THERE IS NOT A LOT OF MILES ON THE TIRE, TO CAUSE THIS KIND OF BULGING.
